item.title: Introduction to Generative Art @ Eventloop
item.description: I presented “Generative Art: Quick introduction to start producing algorithmic visual art“ at Eventloop for their September 2019 meetup. You can see the slides and the repository that contains them. Why? Generative Art has been increasingly interesting for me since March 2018. Although is a pretty recent interest in my life, and I don’t have enough experience to consider myself a reputable artist, I challenged myself to give a presentation about the topic.
